name: Riveter AI
long_description:
Riveter empowers non-technical teams to automate data enrichment at scale using AI search agentsâ€”no engineers required. With Riveter, you can quickly integrate powerful AI into your existing workflows.

E-commerce companies save hundreds of hours by using Riveter to streamline critical operations like launching new products, writing SEO-optimized descriptions, analyzing pricing and competitor data, reviewing customer feedback, and more.

Our founding team brings deep product and engineering expertise from to YC-backed companies Gusto, Retool, and Middesk.
one_liner: Custom data enrichment by AI agents - designed for non-technical teams
